title: Game started even after i removed battery from laptop
body: And i got leaverbuster for it.This is not my fault so remove my leaverbuster please.

replies.body:
also to add, it sounds you were trying to dodge when the game was going to load in which would of not even worked anyway. if you were going to dodge then you should of done it before it transitioned to game.

so yeah the leavebuster penalty sounds deserved to me.
15s left till game starts and i wanted to dodge since my mouse died and had to restart pc

> [{quoted}](name=50ShadesOfÀDC,realm=EUNE,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=o97IlMEa,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2017-10-15T22:21:43.336+0000)
>
> 15s left till game starts and i wanted to dodge since my mouse died and had to restart pc

if your pc took longer then 15seconds to restart then that is why

you should just let it shut down instead of restarting it takes less time and it starts up faster.

for future reference, list the reasons why instead of just saying you left and had to pull the battery out to shut down, there was no context of a technical issue which is why it sounds like it was deserved to me.

It doesn't sound like the best idea to yank out the laptop battery right before a game, but leaving for any reason still puts the rest of your team at a disadvantage which is the main reason behind leaverbusters.
But they remade the game!No one lost anything besides 3 min {{sticker:sg-janna}}
